questions: Is there an image of a character whose aura is being graded? Answer with yes or no.
Is the image cropped to the size of a real card? Answer with yes or no.
Does the label at the top have the title 'GNRLYXYZ'? Answer with yes or no.
Is '1/1' displayed directly below 'GNRLYXYZ' on the label? Answer with yes or no.
Is there a barcode placed beneath the '1/1'? Answer with yes or no.
Is the grade label displayed on the right side of the label at the top? Answer with yes or no.
Is the numeric grade from the scale displayed below the grade label? Answer with yes or no.
Is the certification number displayed below the numeric grade? Answer with yes or no.
Is all text on the label uniform in size? Answer with yes or no.
Is there balanced padding from the border for all text on the label? Answer with yes or no.
Is the display placed on a white background? Answer with yes or no.
Is the full display shown without any text or labels on the card? Answer with yes or no.
model_output:
no - The image depicts a character with an aura, but there is no indication that the aura is being "graded" in the sense of a card or official evaluation.
no - The image does not present itself in a form that suggests it is cropped to the size of a real card.
no - The top of the image does not display a label, text, or title of 'GNRLYXYZ'.
no - The label '1/1' is not visible directly below 'GNRLYXYZ' or elsewhere in the image.
no - There is no barcode present beneath any labeling in the image.
no - The grade label is not displayed on the right side or elsewhere at the top of the image.
no - There is no numeric grade from a scale displayed anywhere in the image.
no - The image does not include a certification number beneath a numeric grade or elsewhere.
no - Not applicable as there is no label or text present in the image.
no - No text is present in the image, therefore there is no padding related to text.
no - The background of the image itself is composed of fiery and dark elements, not a white background.
yes - The display shown contains no additional text or labels on the card itself.
